title: (x) Fonts used in The Source Magazine - Corisande, Eidetic Neo, Kaas, Structia Panel {Akira, Yves, Florian}
content:
Hey,

I was wondering if anyone knows of the fonts used for THE SOURCE MAGAZINE.

Any help is much appreciated!

Thanks!
author: tide

comments.content:
Hi Dane,  
 [this one?](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854/http:/www.thesource.com/)  
Do you have a sample?  
F
yes, it is that mag. I have some screen shots...
i cant upload them at the moment....

Hello Dane, welcome to Typophile. The forums can be a little confusing, but please [Post to the Type ID board](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854/http:/typophile.com/node/add/forum/29) next time. Thanks!

alrighty, i will

here are some fonts if anyone can help me out...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%201_5789.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_5813.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%204_6074.png)

[Corisande](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854/http:/www.identifont.com/show?9SM) for ‘Nasir Bin Olu Dara Jones ccracks a smile.’ and [Eidetic Neo](http://web.archive.org/web/20090803115854/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/emigre/eidetic_neo_italic/) for the italic serif.
